Package reskue.user

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
kueres.base.BaseController<UserEntity,​UserRepository,​UserService>
reskue.user.UserController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/user")
public class UserController
extends kueres.base.BaseController<UserEntity,​UserRepository,​UserService>
The UserController provides API functions for UserEntities. These functions are: - all functions of the BaseController in kueres.base - finding all tasks a user is a contact of - finding all tasks a user is a helper of - finding all comments a user is an author of - finding all user groups a user is a part of - finding all notifications a user has send - finding all notifications a user should receive
Since:
Mar 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan Strassburg, jan.strassburg@student.kit.edu

      Parameters:

      response - - the response.
      Returns:

    • getTasksWhereUserIsContact

      @GetMapping("/{id}/contactTasks") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TaskEntity> getTasksWhereUserIsContact​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> filter, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> sort, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> page, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> size)
      Find all tasks that the user is a contact of. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.

      See kueres.query.SearchCriteria for filter syntax.

      See kueres.query.SortBuilder for sort syntax.

      Parameters:
      id - - the user's identifier.
      filter - - the filter options.
      sort - - the sort options.
      page - - the number of the page used for pagination.
      size - - the size of the page used for pagination.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.
